website_summaries.verdict: A smaller version of classic Pro-Tec pads, these pads are built for impact, including metal-reinforced wrist guards.
pros: Comes in youth small or medium
Includes pair of knee pads, pair of elbow pads and pair of wrist guards
Metal-reinforced wrist guards to prevent scrapes
cons: Not as comfortable as other sets, but it's because they have more substance and structure

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product from an original brand
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product from an original brand! These were for my 7 year old ~ 50 lb son. They are loose but vecro will tighten enough to fit his size and will fit him over the next i would say 2 more years. He is dropping into bowls and doesn't fear falling with these protective pads, they are also cushioned to help damper the impact. His skateboard skills instantly improved with the added protection and even my fears are less after watching him fall and jump back up.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Secure/Durable/Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My kid uses these pads for everything from skating, skateboarding or bycycling. These wrist guards are also useful for snowboarding or skiing. The pads themselves are very durable as my kid has tested them many times. They have a few scuffs, but there is no damage. Knee pads stay in place because the bottom use a cinch strap, which keeps the pad from riding up the leg. All you have to do is bend the knees to put the pad back in the right place. The elbow pads and wrist guards are secure, durable and comfortable. They stay in place without moving.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIE

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great !!! My son who is a 65lb 6 year old fits nicely in them!!! They do occasionally hurt the back of his knee. The Velcro if not done just right will scrape his skin if he wears shorts. but they are super high quality and gives him the protection he needs!!! However I do not believe he will be able to wear them next year as they are perfect for him now but when he gets bigger they will be too small. Luckily I have a nephew I can hand them down to, and I do believe they will last a great deal longer. I think I purchased the medium
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 5 year olds birthday as he’s just starting to skate. They have kept him confident and protected through a lot of abuse. He’s incredibly skinny and while they overwhelm him width wise, we are able to get them tight enough to stay put. He’s 3’10” and about 40lbs. We tried them on my 8 year old who is bigger than average (4’7” and 75ish lbs) and they were the right size pads, but a bit tight around his arms and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product. Youth small fits 70 lb, 10 yr old. (Probably soon to be too small for anyone bigger than that). Important to have the wrist guards and not just the knee and elbow pads.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 4 year old son perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pads! He is a big kid for 4 so I thought I would start him out skateboarding early. These pads are exactly what he needed. Perfect fit but room to grow! It’s hard to get kids not to use their hands when they fall and good pads accelerate that learning curve. The wrist guards are definitely helpful for beginners as they already prevented one certain E.R. trip! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: No more scraped elbows or knees
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and the JBM set for my 9 yr old stepson. He thinks he's a pro and doesn't need pads but we don't want to try it out with a trip to the ER. These pads fit great. Great coverage. We ended up keeping both sets of pads and have the extra set for his grandparent's house, but these definitely fit better and have better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: SCgemini

customer_reviews.title: Great for my seven-year-old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Great for my seven-year-old grandson- he's just learning to rollerskate and I insisted on a good pads. I read a lot of reviews of China crap being sold on Amazon however this is the real deal. These are good quality he falls right onto his knees and they protect his knees and they fit well and are fully adjustable. I would not order them for anybody that weighed less than about 60 pounds ...they would be too big
customer_reviews.author: MeeMaw Terry

customer_reviews.title: Knee pads are awesome. They always stay in place and provide good ...
customer_reviews.text: Son is using them for his inline skating practice for 4 months now. Knee pads are awesome. They always stay in place and provide good protection. But the elbow keeps sliding down. And we have to refasten them atleast once after starting the practise. But the cups are solid and does its job. I especially like wrist guards. They are perfect fit and provide good protection.
customer_reviews.author: raji

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set For Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and just what I needed! Purchased for my 5 year old daughter to wear at the skate parks. The pads fit just fine.. a little maxed out on the tightness but they don't move around at all. She's taken a few massive spills on the ramps and thank goodness for the pads! They did a fantastic job protecting my precious cargo. Planning on purchasing the same set for little sister.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these and so far so good. He falls a lot. I suspect they will last a year or so with heavy use on him. To put it in perspective, a cheaper set of knee pads lasted him a week and then fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Tuff E Nuff
customer_reviews.text: Fit good, look good, made great. Protec youth size is what I bought for my kids on Amazon. I previously had ordered cheaper ones but they were way to small before finally getting the Protec.
customer_reviews.author: marco miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Made for bigger bodies but fits super skinny as well. Durable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal and worth every penny. My 90th percentile height / 12th percentile weight, string bean daughter made me worried. However they are adjustable to the point that they fit even her. She has fallen every way possible and had no major issues. (Just make sure the wrist guards are tight and have them practice falling on them in the grass.)
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I bought size small for my 5 year old daughter. She's 45 lbs. They are a little big but not so big that she couldn't wear them ice skating. She'll have these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: AtTheBeach

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR PRICE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE AND VALUE FOR THIS PRODUCT BOUGHT FOR GRAND SON AGE 10 TO GO WITH HIS NEW SKATE BOARD ON XMAS HE LOVES PRODUCT EXCELLENT PROTECTION
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM WINEGARD

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pads for the price. They slip on, instead of just velcro like most cheap pads. They do a great job of staying up. They are perfect for my 6 year old to use at the skatepark!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Fit 9 yo and 6 yo
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of pads for my kids, 6 and 9, who are average size for their ages. They fit perfectly and they are able to put them on and off by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Mamalaoshi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got Two Sets, one for our 7 almost 8 year old son, and our nephew who is 9. Great product, nice quality which is expected from Pro-Tec. These fit to be expected and seem like they will hold up well! The knee pads Slip on well and have two Velcro straps to hold them in place. back of knee pad has small hole that I believe helps keep them a bit cooler. However, boys sweat a lot and do get hot while riding bikes, scooters or skate boards. All in All great product!
customer_reviews.author: Family of 3

customer_reviews.title: knee pad fell apart after light use
customer_reviews.text: These pads fit my 7 year old son very well and were great until the knee pad fell apart after just a few months of light use. Very disappointing. I would love to get a replacement in hopes that it was a defective pad.
customer_reviews.author: E Kai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pads!! Comfortable and quality protective gear!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids so they could learn to skateboard with there dad. Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great protective gear for inline skating!
customer_reviews.text: After doing much research I decided to buy 3 sets of these pads for my 3 boys for inline skating. The pads get tons of use a couple times a week and they are holding up great. This is a wonderful price to get the knee, elbow and wrist guards all in one package. The kids all say they are very comfortable as well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: and we love them. they also have growing room with the ...
customer_reviews.text: got these for my 7 year old daughter, and we love them. they also have growing room with the adjustable straps. so she can use them until she's 12-13--> and up! they've proven themselves on her skateboard and rollerblades. stoked on them!
customer_reviews.author: natasilas

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect.. finally
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7yr old boy perfectly. We have tried countless.
customer_reviews.author: Tzee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pad set and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable protective gear set. Just as described. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for a 6 year old boy who is a bit skinny. It fits well and adjustable and he is able to put it on independently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They seem really durable for my 9 year ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They seem really durable for my 9 year old skate boarder. The wrist guards fit perfectly and have saved him from countless injuries. I did deduct one star because the elbow pads always seem to slide down no matter how tightly you strap them on. Otherwise, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 yr. old; just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I Love these! My son loves these and they are a good price. If you want something to protect your rambunctious kid with his scooter then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Baconator

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad set for my 9yo
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9yo great. Quality looks good. Great for a new rollerbader.
customer_reviews.author: BigPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 7 year old perfectly and there's room to grow. She should be wearing them for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Stay On Well.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Really big on my average sized 6 year old. But they stay put really well and seem comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: TAP

customer_reviews.title: Kid been using them and crashed already a few times in them but really doesn't like the fit
customer_reviews.text: Will protect what's it's ment for but comfort is low. Kid been using them and crashed already a few times in them but really doesn't like the fit. Padding has bad spots that forms blisters on kid who actually use them for more then 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: n3v45

customer_reviews.title: Safe!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 8 year old nephew perfectly. Very sturdy and plump. They are very well constructed and keep the family worry free.
customer_reviews.author: Trae Hancock

customer_reviews.title: She is new to skateboarding so I love that she is protected when skating
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter perfectly. She is new to skateboarding so I love that she is protected when skating. They don't slip and these are the same ones she used as a rental from the skateboarding school.
customer_reviews.author: Christy K.

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: great price for a great set. kids out grow this stuff so fast..his loos new and doesn't fit. lol
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on my small 6 year old. She fits them and will be able to use them for at least another year.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: gift for 9 year old. straps on arms dug ...
customer_reviews.text: gift for 9 year old . straps on arms dug into childs arm when wearing short sleeves, otherwise a well made product
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W. Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Best pads you can get.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pads money can buy. They fit my son perfectly and he loves riding with them.
customer_reviews.author: David and Lilit Conelly

customer_reviews.title: Total protection!
customer_reviews.text: Has saved me thousands of dollars in medical bills for my two boys! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best Pads Out There
customer_reviews.text: I grew up skating with Pro-Tec pads so I bought them for my daughter when she started skating. The quality & protection is just as great as I remembered. Go get these if your kids want to skate or ride a bike!
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 and half and it fits him very well
customer_reviews.author: teriivaea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my son, how to find more sizes for older kid?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Tec protects my child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my budding 5-year old skater. It fits him perfectly with some room to grow into. They are very durable and protects him from any joint injuries. And he said they're quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carinabox

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy company to deal with. Medium fit my 10 year old son perfectly. He’s 4’8” and 75lbs for reference. There was an issue with my order and they rectified it quickly and without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 5yr old daughter and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Skateboard pads
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them! Thank you. Fast shipping and trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. Fit my 9 year old girl perfect and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. Fit my 9 year old girl perfect and has some room to grow. She weighs 56 lbs so it a little thin to average. Good quality,

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Our son is very active with his skateboarding and these are great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for our grand daughter while riding her bike, skate board etc.

customer_reviews.title: Great - my 9yo daughter likes them and is happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great - my 9yo daughter likes them and is happy to wear them. She feels safe in them. Uses them when she rip sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slide on plus strap
customer_reviews.text: A little big but the best quality. ProTec has been the best for years. The best feature is the pads also slide on over clothing, the strap.

customer_reviews.title: Small for my son who 8yrs old
customer_reviews.text: Not for my 8 year old son. They did fit my daughter who is 5yrs old.

customer_reviews.title: Good pad Set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set, I bought them for my 7 year old grandson, they fit perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads
customer_reviews.text: Great pads. My 10 year old already took a bad tumble and popped back unscathed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous pads that are durable for our skater that takes chances and loves to try new things!

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: A little tight for my 8yr old. Probably should have ordered the next size up

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Good set of pads. 4 year old son using them for skateboarding.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my six year old, he is 4 foot and 48 pounds and these are just slightly big, giving him room to grow so i don't have to but new ones too soon. They are easy to put on and he can do it himself. I especially love the wrist guards....I am very worried about wrist injuries so these are a must and he doesn't mind wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: moosmom

customer_reviews.title: It"s good protection, although it isn't excectly for bike rider
customer_reviews.text: It"s good protection , although it isn't excectly for bike rider , but for kids who rides in the city area it's fine !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable for my 6 years old kid. They fit really well, and should last for 2-3 years

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 year old daughter. Bought 2, but had to exchange one set as this size is too small for my 12 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Great pads, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit for 6 year old. Great quality and I'm super impressed with the comfort level and adjustment. Better than the protec pads I sk8d with as a teenager in the 90s. Gonna get me an adult pair like it!

customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 yr old daughter and they were perfect! Great quality for the price. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a major design flaw because these could be really nice pads. We returned them because our child kept ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 5 year old to wear while riding her bike at the BMX track. There is a weird gap in the knee pads and elbow pads that start to pinch their little arms. I think it is a major design flaw because these could be really nice pads. We returned them because our child kept complaining about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: decker

customer_reviews.title: Fit my son fine. It's the same one being sold in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son fine. It's the same one being sold in the store but for about 30% less.
customer_reviews.author: carey tanaka

product_meta.title: Pro-Tec - Street Gear Jr 3 Pack
product_meta.description: Includes: Knee pads, elbow pads, and wrist guards. Elbow and Knee Pads both come with elastic sleeves to help keep the pads in place while cruising around. All three pads feature Velcro enclosures as well to ensure a proper fit!
feature_bullets: Full wrap hook and loop fasteners for a secure fit
CE EN 14120:2003 + A1:2007 level B for riders between 25 and 50 kg (550 to 110 lbs)
45 years of Pro-Tec heritage producing the most stylish protective gear on the market
Stretch lycra interior with upper and lower support straps
